trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientEnumerator class provides enumeration functionality for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: La classe CmsRecipientEnumerator fornisce funzionalità di enumerazione per il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà corrente recupera corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the current recipient in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta il destinatario nel <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The MoveNext method advances the enumeration to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo MoveNext sposta l'enumerazione al successivo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumeration successfully moved to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumeration moved past the last item in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'enumerazione è passata alla successiva <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> oggetto; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se l'enumerazione spostato oltre l'ultimo elemento nell'enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The Reset method resets the enumeration to the first <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il primo metodo Reset Reimposta l'enumerazione <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The IEnumerator.Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà IEnumerator recupera corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the current recipient in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta il destinatario nel <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> insieme.
